SELECT_ORDER_STATUS_ID_BY_ORIGINAL_ORDER: select ORDER_STATUS_ID from ecm.sales_order where ORIGINAL_ORDER_NUMBER =: Order_number
SELECT_ORDER_STATUS_ID_BY_EPCOT_ORDER_NU: select ORDER_STATUS_ID from ecm.sales_order where ORDER_NUMBER =: Order_number
SELECT_ORDER_STATUS_DATA: select ORDER_STATUS_ID, DESCRIPTION, SHOW_COM_STATUS, SHOW_COM_HOLDS, CUSTOMER_DESCRIPTION from ecm.order_status
